title: Interpretation of an explosion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about an explosion, according to what was interpreted by the great interpreter Muhammad Ibn Sirin. Its visionaries and scholars believe that the meaning of this vision varies from one person to another according to their social status, and that is why we will present to you in the following article from the encyclopedia the most prominent offers of interpretation scholars in interpreting this dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman.Interpretation of an explosion in a dreamThe explosion in a dream by Ibn Siriniri Imam Muhammad Bin Sirin said that seeing an explosion in a dream has many repercussions, and this vision may indicate that the dreamer will lose in his life. This dream may indicate the coming of sad events because of which the person who dreams will suffer. If the dreamer sees in his dream the explosion on his face until the face turns color Black, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from injustice in his life. Seeing the explosion and the help of flames in the sky and the appearance of thick smoke is a vision that indicates the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life, and the enemies may be colleagues at work. And if he sees in his dream an explosion that makes him fly into If an unmarried girl sees an explosion in her dream, this dream indicates that she will be exposed to problems because of her friends. This vision may indicate the presence of a person who speaks bad words and tries to slander her. He heard the girl who saw the dream. Interpretation scholars say that seeing an explosion in an unmarried girl’s dream is one of the unpleasant dreams and carries a warning to her about the need to be careful in her behavior with the people around her. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees the explosion in her dream, this The vision indicates the arrival of many problems and the instability of her family life. This vision may indicate the emergence of disagreements between her and her husband or the emergence of disagreements with her family. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for a pregnant woman: Interpretation scholars say that if a pregnant woman sees an explosion in her dream, this vision indicates To the emergence of unexpected events. This vision may indicate the exhaustion that the dreamer is suffering from during her pregnancy, but God Almighty will relieve her of it soon. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for a man. Watching an explosion in a man’s dream indicates sad and painful events that the dreamer will face in his coming days. It may This vision indicates the dreamer’s anger at the things that are bothering him in his life. Dream interpretation scholars say that this dream carries a warning to the dreamer about the need to be careful in reviewing all the issues and decisions he has taken in the recent period. The explosion in the dream may indicate the arrival of illness to the dreamer or his exposure to problems. Which he will suffer. If the man is single, the explosion in his dream indicates his separation from the girl he loves. If he is married, seeing the explosion indicates the family problems he will suffer with his wife. Thus, we have explained to you the interpretation of seeing the explosion in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, According to what was explained by the scholar Imam Muhammad bin Sirin in his book in Taf

title: Interpretation of a dream about Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, whether he enters Al-Aqsa Mosque, prays, makes supplications, or sits in the mosque. Palestine by Ibn Sirin Seeing Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream is good. Whoever sees in his dream that he is an imam of a mosque and leads people in prayer, this is evidence of good deeds, and that the one who sees is close to God Almighty and loves doing good, and because dreams are interpreted differently. From one person to another and depending on the place, we will present the interpretation of the dream of seeing Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream to the greatest Arab scholars and dream interpreters. Interpretation of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dreamSeeing Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream means sudden fast travel and transportation. Dreaming of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream indicates a blessing. Whoever sees Al-Aqsa Mosque in his dream, this indicates On jihad and diligence in work, perseverance, and striving at the highest and highest levels to improve the conditions of the Messenger, his livelihood, his religion, and his worldly affairs. Entering Al-Aqsa Mosque in your dream indicates a matter in which people are united in opinion, agreement, and love. Interpretation of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is doing all duties in Al-Aqsa Mosque, this is evidence that she is pure and chaste. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is praying behind a young man in Al-Aqsa Mosque, this is evidence that she will soon marry a good young man who fears God and will live a decent life with him, and God is supreme. And he knows better. Interpretation of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is praying as an imam in Al-Aqsa Mosque, then this is evidence of the good condition of this family and the happiness of this husband. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is entering a spacious and beautiful mosque to connect with it, then this is a sign Kindness and sustenance soon, God willing. Interpretation of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is praying behind her husband in Al-Aqsa Mosque, this is evidence that this woman will give birth to a boy and the birth will be natural and easy, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is helping in building a mosque If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is praying every prayer in Al-Aqsa Mosque, this is evidence of the fulfillment of a desire that she has had for a long time. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is building a large mosque, this is evidence that the dreamer will soon obtain a prestigious job. He stands on the roof of the house and sees Al-Aqsa Mosque from afar. Traveling soon for those who see a trip with friends, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream - YouTube

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a bag in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The bag in a dream has many meanings and connotations for dreamers and makes them desperate to know them, and the following article will explain many of the interpretations provided by scholars on this topic, so let's read more. The bag in a dream Seeing a bag in a dream indicates the abundant blessings that he will enjoy in his coming days, which will make him very happy. If someone sees a bag in his dream, this is a sign of joyful news that will reach him and make him very happy. If the dreamer sees the bag in his sleep, this expresses the good events that will happen in his life and will make him extremely satisfied with it. Seeing the owner of the dream in his bag The dream symbolizes his achievement of many things that he has dreamed of achieving for a long time. The bag in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer's vision in a dream of having a bag containing many papers as an indication of the many plans that he seeks to implement and does his best to do so. If someone sees a closed bag in his dream, this is a sign of many things that he does secretly and does not want to reveal to anyone else. If the dreamer sees the bag while sleeping, this indicates that he tends to stay alone most of the time and avoids gatherings. Seeing The dreamer in his dream with the bag symbolizes the presence of many transformations that will occur in his life and will make him very satisfied with it. What is the interpretation of the bag in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman in a dream about a bag symbolizes that she does not like to share her personal matters with anyone, and this makes her mysterious in the eyes of many around her. If the dreamer sees the bag on her back during her sleep, this is a sign that there are many responsibilities that fall on her shoulders and she tries to keep them as much as possible. If the dreamer sees the bag in her hand in her dream, this indicates her excellence in the end-of-year exams and obtaining the highest grades, which will make her family very proud of her. The girl seeing the bag in her dream symbolizes her effort at that time to achieve many things that she has dreamed of for a long time. The black bag in the dream of a single woman If an unmarried woman sees the black bag in her dream, this is a sign of the abundance of food that she will get in her life, which makes her happy. If the dreamer sees the black bag in his dream, this indicates that her future partner will have many good qualities that will make her closely attached to him. The dreamer sees the bag The black bag in her dream symbolizes the good things that will happen in her life and will make her very happy. The girl who sees a black bag in her dream indicates the good news that she will receive and spread joy around her a lot. A red bag in a dream for a single woman Seeing unmarried people in a dream a red bag shows the good news that will reach their ears in the coming days and will make them feel good. If the dreamer sees the red bag in his sleep, this is a sign that there is something that greatly disturbs her thinking during this period and prevents her from feeling

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing grandfather and grandmother by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing grandparents: Grandmother and grandmother in a dream are among the beautiful and wonderful dreams that we constantly see in our dreams because of our longing and great love for grandmother or great-grandmother in public life, because the dream has many important meanings that must stand, and we can see grandfather or grandmother in the dream after their death to express About how much we long for their lives or seeing them alive in public places, because every dream has its own interpretation, which the dreamer must know. Interpretation of seeing grandfather and grandmother according to Ibn Sirin Seeing grandfather in a dream is an indication that the dreamer longs for the past. Seeing grandparents in a dream may indicate Fulfilling the dreams and aspirations that the pioneer seeks. This vision may indicate leisure travel and entertainment. Seeing a smiling grandfather in a dream is evidence that the person who sees it is religious. Seeing a deceased grandfather in a dream may mean staying away from sins and distractions. Seeing a dead grandmother in a dream refers to Life, this means that ambition and insight is a positive person. Interpretation of seeing a grandmother for a single girl: Seeing grandparents in a dream with an ugly appearance is an indication that the girl feels despair and frustration. Seeing a dead grandmother in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of goodness, blessing, and livelihood. Seeing a girl praying behind her grandfather In a dream, it is a sign of her feeling of security. If a girl sees her grandparents in bed in a dream, this indicates stability and understanding. Interpretation of a dream about a grandfather for a married woman. If a married woman sees grandmother and grandmother in her house, this is a sign of money and livelihood. Seeing a sleeping grandmother in a dream for a married woman is a sign of Pregnancy soon. If a married woman dreams that she is talking to her grandparents about something she wants, this indicates that she will achieve it soon. Grandparents in a dream are generally evidence of the goodness and grace with which this married woman is married. Interpretation of a dream about a grandfather for a pregnant womanIf a woman sees a very pregnant woman in In a dream, she gives birth to a male child, and this is an indication that she will give birth to a girl. Seeing a grandmother with a glowing face in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and sufficiency, as well as a sign of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about grandfather and grandmother for a man: Seeing a deceased grandfather and grandfather may indicate in a man’s dream, this is evidence of Compassion and living. Seeing a man in a dream is a grandmother while she is in her youth, because this indicates a short marriage. Grandfather and grandfather in a dream is evidence of crying and problems. Seeing a serious man in a dream is a sign of perseverance. Interpretation of seeing grandparents in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing a grandmother or great-grandmother A person in a dream is evidence that he feels a strong nostalgia for the past and for the security of his life. A person who sees a grandmother or great-grandmother in a dream is evidence that he is trying to achieve his goals in life. A person seeing only his grandfather in a dream is evidence that he is a hardworking person. Smile A dead grandfather in a dream is evidence of his stability, good life, and position in the world. Seeing his deceased grandfather laughing is evidence of keeping him away from sins. Seeing a dead grandmother in a dream is a sign of death. Seeing a dead grandmother coming back to life in a dream is a sign of positivity in life. Grandma or grandfather to whom

title: Interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone I know suffering from cancer: If the dreamer sees someone he knows with cancer in a dream, this is an indication that this person has many defects that he is not trying to fix. This vision is a sign to him that correcting these defects means repairing and straightening his life. This vision also indicates that this person is suffering. Of some worries and problems that plague his life. But he can overcome them, God willing. If a person sees another person who he knows has cancer in a dream and they have relationships in reality, then this vision indicates the emergence of some situations that will affect this relationship. And if the owner bears Seeing feelings of love and friendliness with someone who saw cancer in a dream. This vision can be an expression of anxiety and the desire for this person to be healthy. Interpretation of a man’s dream of cancer. If he sees a free girl in her dream, and she has cancer, this vision is unpleasant, as it shows that there are people in In her life, they are planning machinations and bad things against her. This vision appears to single people. In most cases, there is an evil woman who is changing and conspiring against her. He is trying to get her into a lot of trouble, so she must be careful and cautious. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a person with cancer and he is near her in a dream, then this A sign of anxiety, deadly fear, and psychological obsessions that dominate her all the time. This vision may be a sign of the anxiety that this woman feels about her pregnancy and her fetus, and her fear that something bad will happen to her. Or that she is in danger during childbirth, leaving her child alone. But the interpretation of this The vision for the pregnant woman is that she should stop worrying, maintain her health, follow her doctor’s instructions, and trust in God. She will leave her affairs and her fetus in the hands of God Almighty, and nothing will happen to her or her child, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about treating a cancer patient. See the point Treating cancer in a dream, in the Gulf after heartache and heartache. And the circumstances have changed. The dreamer has a lot for the better. This vision also shows that the dreamer will live happy days and God will compensate him for what he saw in his life. If he sees another person in his dream, their cancer is cured in the dream. This is evidence that the dreamer thinks a lot about this person, his circumstances, and his repeated prayers for him. Interpretation of seeing a dead person with cancer: If a person sees a person dying with another person and in reality he is sick with cancer in a dream, this is evidence of the death of this deceased and he owes a debt and is asking for its repayment. There is another interpretation, which is that this person, under the protection of God Almighty, died because of a great sin, for which he will be tortured greatly later. He asks the living to Show mercy to him, may God have mercy on him, and lighten his torment. I dreamed that my brother had cancer. Interpretation scholars say that human infection. Family. The dreamer of cancer in a dream is considered evidence of the dreamer’s feeling of fear and anxiety about the unknown. What if the dreamer saw his brother or sister suffering from cancer in the dream, this was a sign of their physical health. And their power in reality. But at the same time, this vision indicates that they may be involved in a great sin or disobedience in the very near future. If one sees that

title: Interpretation of the number 10 in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the number ten in a dream and the numbers “10- 100-1000-10000-1000000” The truth is that the number ten is not a number in the mathematical or numerical sense of the word, but rather it is the first of the numbers. As for its symbols, they are many, its connotations are multiple, and its meanings are limitless. It is the first number that combines zero and one, and therefore it is a sign of intimate marriage for the unmarried, the divorced, and the widow. The number ten is a symbol of abundance, reproduction or abundance, doubling livelihood and money, and it is a symbol of leadership or rule, and ten in a dream symbolizes a man’s wisdom and intelligence and symbolizes a child’s genius. The ten has many other meanings that can be summarized as follows: strength, courage, physiognomy, perfection, kindness, goodness, faith, etc. Blessing will come. Interpretation of seeing the number 10 in a dream? The number 10 in a dream often symbolizes victory and success that the dreamer will achieve in various fields. Seeing the number 10 in a dream portends the dreamer overcoming the stage of unhappiness and fatigue that he faces in reality and moving to a new stage of joy. And psychological and material comfort. For the traveler, this dream symbolizes the ease of his journey and his safe arrival in the country he is going to. Seeing the number 10 in a dream warns the merchant of danger in his field of work and the possibility of his loss and failure. How is this dream interpreted for unmarried women? – Dreaming about the number 10 carries positive interpretations for a single woman who is going through a transition from a difficult stage to a new stage full of success, especially financial gains. For a married woman, this dream portends her imminent pregnancy, nourishment, and kindness. As for a pregnant woman, this dream promises her getting rid of the misfortunes and problems that You encounter it in reality. title: Interpretation of a dream about loving sunflowers and seeing eating sunflower seeds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of love for a sunflower flower in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, if I dream that I am eating sunflower seeds, the love of the sun is Ain Wa Karaz, by Ibn Sirin, by Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of a dream about a revolving flower or a sunflower button. Interpretation of sunflowers in a dream when A male or female sees a handful or a small amount of sunflower seeds, which we call a sunflower flower. If this amount is small, this indicates a good condition and better than the current one. The greater the amount he sees in front of him, the more a life of goodness and happiness will advance. If this handful or quantity is the dreamer’s property. His livelihood is from money or kindness, which he collects with his hands, as seeds are collected from flowers. Eating sunflower seeds indicates more than one situation. If the dreamer, male or female, peels it and throws the skin on the ground, then he will approach for it or be one of the individuals. The family is dear. As for throwing the peels randomly, he will find goodness without a promise. And whoever eats them and collects their texture gathers goodness with his hand, and whoever labors with them. And whoever is sick and eats them, it is a cure for him. And whoever sees the seeds without peels, it is a revelation for them, and the disappearance of sadness, and for the afflicted there is relief. For the sick there is healing and comfort for the prisoner, and for the sad is joy. As for the one who abstains from eating it, or abstains from Eating them when asked to do so in a dream, this indicates illness or a path of sadness and hardship. If the seeds do not ripen, then the matter is entrusted to the ruler to do good and righteous deeds so that he may enjoy goodness and sustenance after him. As for the size of the seeds, whether large or small, depends on the degree of goodness that the dreamer will acquire. , or on losing them and overcoming life’s difficulties. Whoever plants sunflower seeds will reap abundantly in his life or have good children, and whoever throws them in the garbage, even if they are edible, it is a waste of his money or his family. Interpretation of sunflowers in a dreamSunflowers or sunflowers The sun in a dream has many interpretations in dream interpretation and its interpretation may differ from one person to another, but the general meaning of this plant in a dream remains very positive. Profiting or collecting money especially for people who see their dreams as collecting or eating them. The sunflower or sunflower is praised in a dream because of its yellow color, which is very similar to the color of sunlight. Interpretation of sunflowers or varieties in one dreamSunflower, sunflower, Sunflower or the tilt of the sun are all names that benefit the plant, and they are among the plants with good meaning in dreams, for various considerations, perhaps the most important of which is the functional importance of this plant in waking life, as it is used for various purposes such as cooking, medicines, cosmetics, etc.... Benefits of sunflowers in waking life It makes it a positive symbol in a person's dream. Perhaps its most clear indication is facilitating and reconciling some of the issues that the girl seeks or desires to achieve. The second fact that gives sunflowers a strong and clear meaning is giving or verbal naming, especially since this plant in its verbal structure contains the word “sun” and this word is interpreted as Dreams indicate dead hope

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete swing in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream. It is famous for its swing and it is one of the games that children and even adults love. You know how to see a swing in a dream, which for some comes in a complete dream. Therefore, we have collected for you, dear ones in God, everything related to knowing the complete interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream, as well as the complete interpretation of riding a swing in a dream and all the meanings of interpreting a dream about hovering in a complete dream. Air, as we say, is the interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream for a man who appears married and handsome, as well as for men from the books of great scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Seeing a complete development in a dream The interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream has meanings that reflect the state of the beholder, and swing indicates happiness and pleasure for the dreamer Seeing a swing in a dream means changes that will happen to the dreamer in the near future and is a sign of high status. Also, seeing a hammock in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of all the worries and problems that he suffers from in this life. Seeing a hammock falling in a dream indicates some decisions. A mistake that the dreamer will make, which will cause him sadness and confusion. Why dream of a hammock for a big woman? Why does a single woman dream of a hammock indicates that she needs to take care of her actions, which may lead her to a dead end. A note hovering at work or school indicates to a single woman that she is neglecting school or Work and you must be careful before making any mistakes. Riding on a swing in an amusement park or in a park is evidence of the joy of a girl entering the next life and achieving many happy things. Why does a married woman dream of full development in a dream? Seeing a married woman swinging on a swing in Swinging is a desirable dream, which indicates that she will face an imminent pregnancy. If you see a full development in the dream, and it is in a woman’s workplace, it means that she will enter a period full of troubles, troubles, and imminent circumstances. A swinging house for a married woman in a full dream is a sign of happiness and stability. , as well as nourishing her with many wishes and benefits. Why dream of a baby bed for a pregnant woman? The full development in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the safety and security of her fetus, improved health and ease of delivery. Seeing a sofa that turns into a hammock in a dream in its entirety means that it will bring happy deeds and good news Healing from all diseases. Why does a man dream of a swing? Riding a swing in a dream for a man is a good vision, denotes happiness, gets rid of all problems, and fulfills many desires and useful works. Cutting off a swing in a dream indicates a low level of happiness for a man and indicates that he will have to Participating in many battles will lead him to sadness. Why do you dream of floating in the sky? Dreaming of him floating in the sky indicates useful things, and indicates the high status of the pioneer, whether in his work or trade. Why dream of riding on a swing? Riding on a swing among children and in public parks

title: Interpretation of Aisha in a dream - Seeing Aisha, may God be pleased with her, in a dream

preview.html: I saw the Mother of the Believers in a dream, Mrs. Aisha, may God be pleased with her. Aisha’s interpretation of the dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing her in a dream means kindness and blessing. If a woman sees her, she will gain a high status, a good reputation, and be loved by fathers and husbands. The name Aisha in a dream. Dream interpretation experts say that seeing the name Aisha in a dream indicates a great deal of goodness and that God Almighty will grant him goodness and blessings and grant him his righteous successors, most of whom are girls. Seeing the Prophet’s wives in Seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream indicates motherhood, tenderness, kindness, and many blessings, as seeing the Prophet’s wives indicates good offspring. As for whoever sees Mrs. Hafsa in her dream, this indicates deception, and whether he sees in his dream the mother of the believers, Khadija, may God be pleased with her, she will witness great happiness in Her life and God will bless her. Good offspring, male and female, and God knows him through their eyes. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger’s wives for unity. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi say that if a man sees in a dream one of the Messenger’s wives, may God bless him and grant him peace, while he is free, this means that he will marry a pure, righteous woman and protect his eyes. With her, God will bless her with a good man soon. But if the woman is pregnant and sees Mrs. Aisha in her dream, this indicates that God will give her a daughter who will be righteous, and he will recognize his eye with her. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s daughter. Dream interpretation scholars say that they saw Fatima, daughter of the Messenger of God in a dream, which indicates On her loss, which means that she will lose her father, husband, and mother in her life, like Fatima Al-Zahra, may God bless her. Satisfied with her, she lost all of that in her life. Interpretation of Al-Hassan and Al-Hussein in a dream Ibn Shaheen says: Whoever sees Al-Hassan and Al-Hussein in a dream, this indicates strife, and indicates martyrdom in the path of God. The descendants of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, were martyred in the path of God because of strife. . It indicates that this person will suffer from severe fatigue during travel and exile, and it also indicates good character and lineage. Interpretation of the name Aisha in a dream: It is a female name of Arabic origin, but it is widespread in all Islamic countries and means a long-lived girl or a woman whose life is prolonged. The Arabs call Aisha after a friend, the daughter of a friend and the wife of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. The name Aisha in a dream denotes a comfortable life and a happy life full of joy and pleasures. It was said that whoever sees this name in a dream will live in peace, security, tranquility, and tranquility. Likewise in the interpretation (Ayyash, Aisha, Ayush, Aisha, Hayat), and any name derived from life is good in a dream, as it describes a happy life without worries, problems, and difficulties, provided that Aisha appears in a dream in good condition, beautiful face, light and elegant robe. Do a good deed in the dream, or say kind words. Preachers in a dream also prefer that the name Aisha not be close to the fortuneteller, and an exception is made in this regard (daughters, sisters, wives...).Interpretation of Aisha in one dream. The Arabs say: So-and-so lived, meaning he lived a long time, and they also said Aisha, meaning he lives in Goodness and bliss, and he is blessed with care, care and rule. If she sees an unmarried woman in her dream
